palm.title: Palm Predictions (AI)
palm.lead_html: Upload 2–{{max}} photos: left and right palm, optionally — a close-up of lines. We will highlight the main lines and prepare interpretations.

upload.hint: JPG/PNG · up to {{maxSize}} MB each · {{minFiles}}–{{maxFiles}} photos
upload.min_req: Minimum — {{min}} photos (left and right palm). We recommend adding a close-up of the main lines.

state.usually_seconds: This usually takes a few seconds.

auth.required_palm_desc: Palm analysis is available only to authorized users.

how.title: How to take proper photos
how.1: Shoot in diffused daylight, no flash or strong glare.
how.2: Wash and dry your hands, remove rings/bracelets.
how.3: Take photos of the left and right palm, fingers relaxed and slightly open.
how.4: Hold the camera perpendicular; add a 3rd photo — a close-up of the lines.
how.5: JPG/PNG, width ≥ 1000 px, size up to {{max}} MB.
